name: 3dReHo
author: AFNI Developers
description: 3dReHo calculates Kendall's W per voxel using neighborhood voxels from 4D time series data set.

inputs.description: Switch to output Friedman chi-square value per voxel as a subbrick.
inputs.name: Friedman Chi-Square Output Flag

inputs.description: Include a whole brain mask within which to calculate ReHo. Otherwise, data should be masked already.
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: Number of voxels in neighborhood, inclusive; can be 7 (for facewise neighbors), 19 (for face- and edge-wise neighbors), 27 (for face-, edge-, and node-wise neighbors). Default is 27.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Voxel Count

inputs.description: Radius R of a desired neighborhood for voxelwise control, must be a floating point number >1. Examples: R=2.0 -> V=33, R=2.3 -> V=57, etc.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Radius

inputs.description: Semi-radius length A for ellipsoidal neighborhood.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Semi-radius X

inputs.description: Semi-radius length B for ellipsoidal neighborhood.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Semi-radius Y

inputs.description: Semi-radius length C for ellipsoidal neighborhood.
inputs.name: Neighborhood Semi-radius Z

inputs.description: Cubic box radius BR centered on a given voxel for neighborhood control. Examples: BR=1 -> V=27, BR=2 -> V=125, etc.
inputs.name: Cubic Box Radius

inputs.description: Box volume neighborhood dimension X. Values put in get added in the +/- directions of each axis.
inputs.name: Box Volume X

inputs.description: Box volume neighborhood dimension Y. Values put in get added in the +/- directions of each axis.
inputs.name: Box Volume Y

inputs.description: Box volume neighborhood dimension Z. Values put in get added in the +/- directions of each axis.
inputs.name: Box Volume Z

inputs.description: Input a set of ROIs, each labeled with distinct integers. ReHo will be calculated per ROI.
inputs.name: ROIs Input File

output-files.description: Output file containing ReHo/Kendall's W value per voxel.
output-files.name: ReHo Output File

output-files.description: Optional output subbrick containing Friedman chi-square value per voxel.
output-files.name: Chi-Square Output File
